rules_text:
Unceasing Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Unceasing Flames in your graveyard.
Conjure three cards named Unceasing Flames and shuffle them into your main library.
flavor_text:

—Azamir, “The Hero's Journey”[/i]
